SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Metrics: Automatically Track Usage-Based Entitlements for B2B Commerce for Visualforce

Gain insight into your storefronts, orders, and products activity. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now reports metrics information in the Usage-based Entitlements related list, which you can find under Company Information under Setup. There’s no extra setup required to access this information.

Where: This change applies to all versions of the B2B Commerce for Visualforce managed package in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

Who: Usage-based entitlements are available for all production orgs that have B2B Commerce for Visualforce installed, regardless of your installed version.

How: The following usage-based entitlements are available, depending on which B2B Commerce for Visualforce license type you've purchased. The Allowance column shows the amount of each entitlement provisioned for your org.

If you have the B2B Commerce Starter, Growth, or Plus license, the following usage-based entitlements are available:

B2B Commerce Total Orders Placed
Number of CC Order records generated during your contract period. This usage count accumulates during the contract period and resets at the end of the contract period.
B2B Commerce Total Products
Number of CC Product records created in your org, including any supported value for the record's Status field: In Creation, Blocked, Not Orderable, or Released.
B2B Commerce Total Active Storefronts
Total number of storefronts that are active in your org.

If you have the B2B Commerce Platform (legacy) license, the following usage-based entitlements are available:

B2B Commerce Orders Placed Per Month
Number of CC Order records generated in a calendar month. This usage count accumulates during the month and resets at the end of the month.
B2B Commerce Total Active Storefronts
Total number of storefronts that are active in your org.

title: Automatically Tracking Usage-Based Entitlements for B2B Commerce
